mapper.select: SELECT a.NAME AS deptName, (SELECT IF(b.FIELD1='','01',b.FIELD1) FROM obpm5.t_department b WHERE a.SUPERIOR = b.ID) AS parentU9cCode FROM obpm5.t_department a WHERE a.VALID = 1 AND a.LEVELS = 1 AND a.NAME != '外协厂家'
mapper.update: update obpm5.t_department set FIELD1 = #{u9cCode} WHERE NAME = #{deptName}
mapper.select: SELECT a.NAME AS name, a.FIELD1 AS u9cCode, (SELECT b.FIELD1 FROM obpm5.t_department b WHERE a.DEFAULTDEPARTMENT = b.ID LIMIT 1) AS deptId FROM obpm5.t_user a WHERE a.`STATUS` = '1' AND a.DDUSERID is NOT NULL
